basics.name: Kermit Joseph Lee
basics.label: Full Stack Developer | React, Typescript, GraphQL, Node
basics.summary:
As a Full Stack Developer at GoodLabs Studio, I create well-tested and visually appealing client-facing front-end and supporting back-end code for Sounding Board, an internal coaching SaaS app for leading Fortune 500 tech companies. I use React, GraphQL, Ruby on Rails, and other cutting-edge technologies to deliver high-quality and scalable solutions that meet the needs of diverse and demanding clients.

With over three years of experience in web development, I have a strong foundation in the fundamentals of coding, as well as a passion for learning new skills and exploring new challenges. I have also been an Education Mentor at Lighthouse Labs since 2018, where I help new coders with assignments and projects, and share my knowledge and insights from the industry. Additionally, I have a unique background in culinary arts and chemistry, which gives me a creative and analytical approach to problem-solving and product development.

work.name: GoodLabs Studio
work.summary:
Under Contract to Sounding Board - an internal coaching SaaS app for leading Fortune 500 tech companies. Responsible for creating well-tested and visually appealing client-facing front-end and supporting back-end code.
Built on Typescript, React, GraphQL, Node, MongoDB, Docker, GCP

work.name: Lighthouse Labs

work.name: FlipGive
work.summary:

work.name: Acme Anvil and Bird Seed Company

work.name: Edible Balloons by Flask & Beaker
work.summary: Our floating soft candy balloons are created before your eyes, to surprise and delight fun lovers of all ages. They can be flavoured (and coloured) in infinite ways, and are the perfectly elegant and fun novelty to augment your event or experiential space.

work.name: Starbucks
work.summary:
•	Implemented evolving standards and ensured the proper implementation of new or highlighted initiatives including line hosting, driving peak, suggestive selling, coffee cadence. 
•	Business Planning including but not limited to scheduling, ordering, adjusting targets and tracking sales, developing partners. Created strategic and operational plans for the work group, managing execution, and measuring results.
•	In charge of Automated Labour Scheduling, Monthly Status Report, Quarterly Business Review, cash and inventory management.
•	Analyzes financial reports to identify and address trends and issues in store performance.
•	Promoted the culture, values, and mission of Starbucks to partners and customers.

work.name: Starbucks Coffee Canada

work.name: Restaurant Le Club Chasse et Peche
work.summary:
•	Worked with a sense of urgency in a fast-paced environment to high standards.
•	Developed, enhanced and formulated new and existing food products from concept approval to development and launch. Member of cross-functional team.
•	Accurately documented recipes and results of pilot trials. Maintained proper documentation.
•	Formulated and developed new products to match business, customer and cost guidelines.
•	Participated in product sensory trials using internal panels.
